title: Perfect for me
content: This pack is perfect for me, as I have never used the lights on light days because they were still not absorbent enough and had to be changed frequently. This package comes with Regular, Super and Super plus which is perfect so I do not have to buy 1 several boxes of different sizes or have many Lights that I do not end up using. The applicator is easy to use and has a slight grip on it to help with control while using. This is not on the cardboard applicators and there can be issues while inserting. This is my go to product.
